subject: Horse Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hanford was inducted into the National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame in 2006. His thoroughbred, Kelso, won a record five Horse of the Year citations.
snippet: Mr. Hanford was inducted into the National Museum of Racing and Hall of Fame in 2006. His thoroughbred, Kelso, won a record five Horse of the Year citations.
